posts.subject: Doubtful RT-PCR test
posts.body:
Dr. Sam Bailey on PCR test and controversy around it.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q9GccuvNs9U

Some points from the video:

* The PCR technique cannot be used as a diagnostic test, it simply duplicates genetic fragments in the sample. So if your immune system encountered the COVID19 virus and tore it into pieces, the test will still be positive. It is like, if you find a hair of a horse, to claim that there is a horse in the room.

* Of if you duplicate things 35 times, you accumulate errors and the result can be just noise.

* The inventor of the PCR sounded the same opinion https://off-guardian.org/2020/10/05/pcr-inventor-it-doesnt-tell-you-that-you-are-sick/

* The RT-PCR test was never properly confirmed to work in the medical sense. When authorities quote its "accuracy" they mean "analytical accuracy", i.e. its chemical accuracy, how well it picks up the correct RNA fragment.

* In fact, it seems the virus itself was never properly isolated and there is a 200k EUR prize for a proof to the opposite https://www.samueleckert.net/isolat-truth-fund/

* Finally, the quickly-published paper that introduced the RT-PCR test for COVID19 "Corman, Drosten, et al" is problematic in many ways, which are examined in a report demanding retraction: https://cormandrostenreview.com/retraction-request-letter-to-eurosurveillance-editorial-board/

The description in her video:

Let's dig deeper into PCR tests once again and have a look behind the curtain of this Covid-19 pandemic.

#covid19pcr​

New 3rd Edition of our book Virus Mania available now!: 
Book Depository - https://www.bookdepository.com/Virus-Mania-Torsten-Engelbrecht/9783752629781?ref=grid-view&qid=1612859431116&sr=1-1​
Amazon - https://www.amazon.com/Virus-Mania-COVID-19-Hepatitis-Billion-Dollar/dp/3752629789/ref=sr_1_2?dchild=1&keywords=virus+mania&qid=1612859505&sr=8-2
E-book...is coming!

References:
1. COVID-19: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coronavirus_disease_2019​
2. Claimed SARS-CoV-2 “Isolation”: ​https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32080990/
3. Proof of SARS-CoV-2 225,000 EUR prize pool: https://www.samueleckert.net/isolat-truth-fund/​
4. Corman, Drosten, et al - Detection of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) by real-time RT-PCR: https://www.eurosurveillance.org/content/10.2807/1560-7917.ES.2020.25.3.2000045​
5. Official recommendation of the Corman-Drosten protocol & manuscript by the WHO,published on January 13th 2020 as version 1.0 of the document:
https://www.who.int/docs/default-source/coronaviruse/wuhan-virus-assay-v1991527e5122341d99287a1b17c111902.pdf; archive: https://web.archive.org/web/20200219150152/https://www.who.int/docs/default-source/coronaviruse/wuhan-virus-assay-v1991527e5122341d99287a1b17c111902.pdf​ 
6. Corman-Drosten Review Report: https://cormandrostenreview.com/retraction-request-letter-to-eurosurveillance-editorial-board/
7. NZ Ministry of Health “COVID-19" test results and their accuracy: https://web.archive.org/web/20210122000504/https://www.health.govt.nz/our-work/diseases-and-conditions/covid-19-novel-coronavirus/covid-19-health-advice-public/assessment-and-testing-covid-19/covid-19-test-results-and-their-accuracy
8. NZ Ministry of Health link to analytical specificity: https://www.finddx.org/covid-19-old/sarscov2-eval-molecular/molecular-eval-results/​
9. The MIQE Guidelines for PCR (Analytic specificity): ​https://www.gene-quantification.de/miqe-bustin-et-al-clin-chem-2009.pdf
 10. ABC Broadcast 22 June 2020, Prof Bill Rawlinson - Director of Virology NSW Health, “...a virus is just a piece of RNA molecule.”: https://www.abc.net.au/radionational/programs/bigideas/covid-testing-and-tracing/12379684​
11. WHO COVID-19 Case definition update 16 December 2020: https://web.archive.org/web/202012231...​
12. WHO SARS-CoV-2 PCR update 20 January 2021: https://www.who.int/news/item/20-01-2...​
13. RT - Landmark legal ruling finds that Covid tests are not fit for purpose.
https://www.rt.com/op-ed/507937-covid...​
14. The Infectious Myth Podcast, David Crowe - Stephen Bustin on Challenges with RT-PCR 14 April 2020: https://toppodcast.com/podcast_feeds/the-infectious-myth/
15. Off-Guardian 5 October 2020 - PCR Inventor: “It doesn’t tell you that you are sick”: https://off-guardian.org/2020/10/05/pcr-inventor-it-doesnt-tell-you-that-you-are-sick/

Want to see more videos about health? Let me know in the comments below.

Subscribe for new YouTube videos ▶https://www.youtube.com/c/DrSamBailey​ 

Follow me on Odysee (go on you know you want to!) ▶https://odysee.com/@drsambailey:c​

Follow me on BrandNew Tube (yes, it has even more stuff!) ▶https://brandnewtube.com/@Drsambailey​

Send business/sponsorship inquiries to admin@drsambailey.com

The paper that introduced the RT-PCR test.

Corman, Drosten, et al - Detection of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) by real-time RT-PCR

The review report.
https://cormandrostenreview.com/retraction-request-letter-to-eurosurveillance-editorial-board/
The MIQE Guidelines: Minimum Information for Publication of Quantitative Real-Time PCR Experiments

Official recommendation (from WHO) of the Corman-Drosten protocol & manuscript by the WHO,published on January 13th 2020 as version 1.0 of the document.

Diagnostic detection of Wuhan coronavirus 2019 by real-time RT-PCR

Protocol and preliminary evaluationas of Jan 13, 2020-Victor Corman, Tobias Bleicker, Sebastian Brünink, Christian Drosten
Charité Virology, Berlin, Germany
Olfert Landt, Tib-Molbiol, Berlin, Germany
Marion KoopmansErasmus MC, Rotterdam, The Netherlands
Maria ZambonPublic Health England, London
Additional advice by Malik Peiris, University of Hong Kong

And a bit heavy podcast with the slip of the tongue from Prof Bill Rawlinson - Director of Virology NSW Health, “...a virus is just a piece of RNA molecule.” at
ABC Broadcast 22 June 2020.

posts.subject: Media Says Economy Is Booming Because Of Government Spending!!
posts.body:
Recent video from George Gammon's YouTube channel "Rebel Capitalist":
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EYMdkvwhHiI

> The economy is "booming" but for some reason they need to spend $1.9 trillion more and "employment remains the main weak spot".
> Manufacturing is at its highest since 2018, with prices rising and inventories choked.

XD

If I did not know that's journalists talking, I'd think they are indeed on cocaine.

(Btw, a good song by Eric Clapton.)

posts.subject: Sue the Fed gofundme campaign!
posts.body:
Help to #EndTheFed before it ends your dollar:

https://www.gofundme.com/f/sue-the-fed

though, it is probably too late to save the dollar... But fighting back must be done.

Same thing on ZeroTalk:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1617127820_1FS7cWbFfDHBxfTJSWmko38NU2iSqoiob6

yeah, it will not work in the sense "getting Fed pay for its actions". But at least it will make some informational pressure. At least some people will notice how Fed is lying right now about "booming economy", the US only needs to spend some more, while it is just a boost for the new crisis. Just like with the affordable housing that led to 2008.

Government always blames "greedy capitalists" for crashes, while it prints trillions dollars, which simultaneously robs the population and breaks the economy. Something must be said about it.

posts.subject: So, all bitcoin transactions are taxable now. No need to outlaw it?
posts.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0OK3YV9VCms

> Bitcoin Billionaires Beware - Tom Wheelwright and Robert Kiyosaki on Bitcoin taxes
>
> If you sold, mined, or traded cryptocurrencies in 2020, then this episode is for you! Tom Wheelwright, Rich Dad Advisor on Taxes, warns listeners as they prepare for filing taxes this year, “Anytime you use or trade your virtual currency, that’s a taxable event.”
>
> But what does trade mean, exactly? According to Tom, if you did anything other than just buy it, then you have to declare it—if you don’t it’s a felony.

Well, well. They almost made private money.

posts.subject: Long term inflation charts
posts.body:
So, the red line is the expectation of the long term inflation rate, the blue is the expected short term inflation rate.

If the red goes higher than blue, it means the bond market expects high long-term inflation. And that could trigger gold price to go up. Gold price really rises when the "real" returns go negative. But anyway it is time for gold to go up already.

posts.subject: Peter Shiff on Stagflation & why dollar rose and gold droped with large inflation numbers
posts.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b6CJO2WSiYw

The last unexpectedly large CPI numbers caused a strange effect in the markets: the gold price dropped and dollar rose up. Why is that?

Because all people who expected low inflation numbers now expect Fed to effectively defeat the inflation by rising interest rates. They just keep believing Fed and the mainstream buzz.

On top of that, the economy underperforms and most likely Fed will try to "fix/stimulate" it by creating more inflation. If so, more inflation will only make the economy weaker, and Fed will have even less chances to stop it.

posts.subject: End Game series
posts.body:
Watch it here:
https://endgameseries.com/viewing/

3rd episode will be live for 8 more hours. Then you can buy it here: https://endgameseries.com/own/

It is about upcoming crisis, what can happen and how to prepare for it. Different quite successful people chime in: George Gammon (Rebel Capitalist show), Robert and Kim Kiyosaki (Rich Dad), Chris Cole (Dragon portfolio), Peter Schiff (Mr Doom), Jason Hartman (real estate extraordinaire), Ken Mcelroy (real estate developer), etc.

It is interesting what they have to say.
